title: ScanHawk Announced!
content: Introducing ScanHawk -- A brand new program to make registering attendance easier than ever. Check out the documentation and release page for more details!

title: New Version of HawkOS Released!
content: HawkOS v2.0 has been released with new features and improved performance. Check out the documentation for more details!

title: Image Sequencer Update
content: The Image Sequencer now supports more file formats and has improved rendering speeds.
